title-1: Gathered by Common Interests, United by Shared Goals
desc-1: In the Science Association, people with common interests, hobbies, and pursuits come together. Here, you can start the university life you've always imagined.
title-2: Mastering Various Skills, Excelling in All Aspects
desc-2: In the Science Association, technology serves as the entry point, while the management and innovation departments... Under the flourishing canopy of the Science Association, no matter what your aspirations are, there will always be avenues for you to grow and develop.
title-3: Simplifying the Complex, Returning to the Essence
desc-3: For over 30 years, the members of the Science Association have steadfastly guarded the purity of this community. We eliminate the trivial matters, restore the true nature of the association, never forgetting our original intentions, and returning to the core.
